name: Quelling Blade
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

descriptions.name: Chop Tree/Ward
descriptions.description: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.Tree Range: 350Ward Range: 450

descriptions.name: Quell
descriptions.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 24 for melee heroes, and 7 for ranged.

notes: Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
